channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 2025 NFL Coach of the Year Odds: Mike Vrabel Clear Favorite, Ben Johnson Surges
item.description: Mike Vrabel is the clear favorite for Coach of the Year but a coach from the NFC is surging up the board.

item.title: 2025-26 College Football Playoff Bracket: Updated After Fifth Rankings Release
item.description: Preview the 2025 College Football Playoff with the most updated CFP rankings, projected 12-team bracket, and key dates as the road to the national cha...

item.title: Rebecca Lowe Joins FOX Sports as FIFA World Cup 2026 Host
item.description: FOX Sports has announced that renowned host and presenter Rebecca Lowe will join its broadcast team for the FIFA World Cup 2026.

item.title: Bill Belichick, Robert Kraft Among Finalists for Pro Football Hall of Fame
item.description: Bill Belichick and Robert Kraft, who won six Super Bowls together with the Patriots, are finalists for the Hall of Fame's Class of 2026.

item.title: 2025 College Football Week 15 Buzz: USF Hires OSU Coach; Big 12 HC Retires
item.description: Here's the latest on what's happening around college football entering Week 15.

item.title: Ja, LaMelo and Trae: Why these All-Star guards may have 'negative value'
item.description: NBA execs weigh in on the players' trade value amid challenging seasons.

item.title: Is a release, trade or retirement next? Answering questions on the futures of Chris Paul and the Clippers
item.description: What's next for Chris Paul? What about the Clippers, who are struggling badly? We answered five questions about this big roster shakeup.

item.title: 2026 recruiting class rankings: How Kiffin, other new coaches are faring
item.description: As more of the best recruits commit, here's our latest look at the top 70 classes.

item.title: NBA Power Rankings: Lakers back near top of West; OKC continues dominance
item.description: NBA insiders break down the first Power Rankings of December, evaluating all 30 teams as the end of the year draws near.

item.title: College football national signing day live: Top commits, flips, moments
item.description: Wednesday is the first day for 2026 prospect to offiically sign. We're tracking all the happenings.
